Room.Name: Leviathan Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Leviathan Drive, north of the Waterfront Intersection.
Room.LongDescription: Leviathan Drive intersects Waterfront Way to the south. A large building on the west side of the road reads "Iila's Cocking Herbs" where a number of light herbs and spices may be purchased, including a number of rarer spices that you might not find elsewhere.
